
Subject: Last warning before deletion of your hosting account

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your shared hosting account has expired %%%EXPIRED_DAYS%%% days ago, on the:
%%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%%, click on the my-account tab, and
renew it.

This is our last warning before we shutdown your shared account. Please
understand that we can't keep your account running as we need the space
for other customers, and that hosting has to be paid in advance. If you
don't renew, we will have to delete your account and all the data it
contains.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
